name: All HTML tags
description: Name: All HTML tags (load)Author: XannaxRating: 3 / 4 (31 votes)Complete and bullet-proof HTML tags detection.It's not mine, it was posted by Phil Haack on his blog http://haacked.com/archive/2004/10/25/usingregularexpressionstomatchhtml.aspxPattern: /</?\w+((\s+\w+(\s*=\s*(?:".*?"|'.*?'|[^'">\s]+))?)+\s*|\s*)/?>/g
author: Xannax
